name: Drop-Zone
author: johannesfosseus, Peo Bondesson (scripting)

sections.description:
This is a small but great plugin that makes it possible to add drop zones to your frontend. It uses HTML5 native drag/drop javascript methods so use a modern browser!

Options
You can choose if you want to use excepts, and images, and the image max heigth and width
sections.installation:
1. Drop plugin in the plugin folder and activate
  2. Add drop zones as widgets in your backend
  3. Go to your front end and drag posts to the drop zones

short_description: Adds a widget that adds "drop zones" to your site front end. Then you can drop posts to the zones and they will stay, magic!
